channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report X-2023030641
item.description:
Report X-2023030641

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-03T13:57:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-03-08
  • City: LONDONDERRY
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA actively leaking from the unload. A safety specialist was notified of the leak, and made sure it was placed in the appropriate bin for processing. DescribePack: The cap was observed to be loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in the appropriate with bin and brought to QA.

item.title: Report E-2023020173
item.description:
Report E-2023020173

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-03T13:57:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-02-07
  • City: MANCHESTER
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics Terminal XNH experienced a release of Barium Nitrate from (3) 10-pound poly bags. ERTS dispatched contractors to complete cleanup and containment. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1.5-cups of product released to the concrete dock floor and a 3' x 3' area of the trailer floor due to a forklift puncture. The damaged bags and released product were collected and containerized into a 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023020134
item.description:
Report X-2023020134

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-03T13:57:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-02-02
  • City: LONDONDERRY
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DURING PACKAGE HANDLING, THE CHARACTERISTIC RATTLE SOUND PRODUCED BY DRY ICE WAS HEARD. RESPONDER OPENED PACKAGE TO FIND FOUR PINTS OF ICE CREAM BEING COOLED BY APPROXIMATELY TWO POUNDS OF DRY ICE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX INDICATING DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED. OUTER BOX IS A THERMO CHILL INSULATED BOX IMPRINTED WITH RUSH, PERISHABLE, AND UP ARROWS. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM VT USING UPS ACCOUNT 517AW3, UNILEVER - BJ BURLINGTON, 30 COMMUNITY DRIVE, SUITE 1, SOUTH BURLINGTON VT 05403.
